text: Two of a Kind is a 1983 American romantic fantasy comedy movie directed by John Herzfeld and starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Charles Durning, Oliver Reed, Beatrice Straight, Scatman Crothers. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 5 Razzie Awards in 1984. == Other websites == * * * Category:1983 romantic comedy movies Category:1983 fantasy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:Movies directed by John Herzfeld Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Two of a Kind (1983 movie)
